column2: As you've received at least one vote for successor to the §Y[Root.GetFullName]§!, you may choose to approve or decline your nomination to the §Y[Root.GetFullName]§!. This decision will last a lifetime.

As you've received at least one vote for successor to the §Y[Root.GetFullName]§!, you may choose to approve or decline your nomination to the §Y[Root.GetFullName]§!. This decision will last a lifetime.
Approve of your nomination to the §Y[Root.GetFullName]§!.
Decline your nomination to the §Y[Root.GetFullName]§!. Not everybody wants to be [Root.GetRulerTitle].
